name: SO.S: Save the Operating System
description:
In this game you take control of ULTIMATE VIRUS ANNIHILATOR™, a powerful antivirus that absolutely destroys any pesky virus dumb enough to threaten its O.S. Protect your operating system from a stupid user who clicks every shady ad that appears on his screen.

How to play

This is a tower defense game where RAM is your currency and health at the same time. As enemies get through your defense lines, you will have less resources to put turrets and will have to be more strategic. But don’t worry, you can reposition your turrets as much as you like, at any time! There are no costs attached to refunding a unit. Just make sure you don’t run out of RAM.

Credits

Background Music by: One Man Symphony

Turrets were made based on: rubberduck

Robots were made based on: Sprite packs 3 & 4 (GrafxKid)
